snippet: The German automaker’s truck and bus business will enter a strategic alliance with Navistar, giving it greater access to the North American market....
abstract: Volkswagen announces its truck and bus unit will buy 16.6 percent stake in truck maker Navistar International Corporation.
lead_paragraph: The German automaker’s truck and bus business will enter a strategic alliance with Navistar, giving it greater access to the North American market.

headline.main: Volkswagen Takes Minority Stake in Truck Maker Navistar
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen  Buys Stake  in American Truck Maker
